span.p: Click here to see a video tutorial on how to find the KWHS performance tasks.
Click here for written directions on how to find the KWHS performance tasks.

The Summer Food Service Program begins April 13, 2020 and will go through May 29, 2020. Details of the pick-up times and places are detailed in the media release found under the "Meal Distribution" tab of the COVID-19 Information page, Facebook, and under District News. There are multiple site across the county where food can be picked-up, and the student does NOT need to be present.
